attributes.action: Get the newly launched Olympic Logo changed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recently launced Logo for the London Olympics in 2012 has received intense criticism from the moment it was launched.  Having costed a reputed £400,000 to comission this petition requests that the Prime Minister put pressure on whoever is paying this money to request it back and commence a competition amongst Londoners to be voted on by Londoners for a logo more acceptable by Londoners

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
